text: Prayers and hearty well wishes to my friend, Utah Congressman Ben McAdams, who has tested positive for #COVID19. His work from his bed at home on behalf of his district, state and country is laudable, selfless and greatly appreciated.
@KimFoxxforSA Congratulations! I know you'll continue to fight for bold, historical change in our criminal justice system every day of your campaign. Onward to November.

That needs to be addressed NOW.

This is a historic health & economic challenge

It requires bold temporary government measures many of us would never support under any other scenario

🚨New York State is now suspending all STATE debt collection.🚨

Specifically, that means if you owe **New York State** any debt payments (student, medical, etc) you will not have to pay for at least the next 30 days.

This is a great move. The federal gov should follow suit. https://twitter.com/nygovcuomo/status/1239970795348094983 QT @NYGovCuomo NEW: Effective immediately, @NewYorkStateAG & I are suspending state debt collection.

NYers with student debt, medical debt & other state-referred debt will have payments frozen for at least 30 days.

We're doing all we can to support those suffering financially due to #COVID19.
